name: A Fortnight with Tom Swifty Quiz | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.  There are no periods after any of the answers..

QUESTION ONE:  "I'm an ordained minister," said Tom ___.
"Boy, these matzo balls are good!" said Tom ___.
questions.explanation:
Judiciously.

	Matzo Balls are considered a Jewish dish.

Mercifully.

	Merci is thank you in French.

Crudely.

	Oil in the ground is crude oil.

Grimly.

	The brothers Grimm wrote fairy tales.

Expansively.

	If your trousers are lost, they are ex pants.

Engagingly.

	If you are about to get married you're engaged.

questions.text: "That city will NEVER be rebuilt", the prophets ___.
questions.explanation:
Babble On.

	Babble On - Babylon...an ancient city that was destroyed.
